ctx: Na prvi februarski dan pet minut počitka za Zemljo
content:
Totalna neumnost. Ker se bodo elektrarne tudi za pet minut
ustavile, kajne?
author: anon-98526

ctx: Na prvi februarski dan pet minut počitka za Zemljo
content:
kul. jaz bom prizgal vse luci, pralni stroj, pecico, mikrovalovko,
sesalec in napo.
author: anon-17372

ctx: Na prvi februarski dan pet minut počitka za Zemljo
content:
Zadnja sprememba: anon-17372 28.01.2007 11:39
We have commented in the past here about how the leadership of the
Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change has flouted its own
guidance to be "policy neutral" by engaging in overt political
advocacy on climate change. The comments by its Director Rajendra
Pachauri reported today again highlight this issue:

I hope this [forthcoming IPCC] report will shock people,
governments into taking more serious action as you really can't get
a more authentic and a more credible piece of scientific
work.

Imagine, by contrast, if the Director of the U.S. Central
Intelligence Agency, another organization with an agenda to be
"policy neutral," were reported in the media to say of the agency’s
latest assessment on Iran, "I hope that the report will shock
people, governments into taking more serious action." He would be
looking for a new job in no time, I am sure. Why should climate
change be treated differently?
 sciencepolicy.colora...utral.html


btw en trailer: www.youtube.com/watc...th_p4p0rfY

"They don't like people."
author: anon-17372

ctx: Na prvi februarski dan pet minut počitka za Zemljo
content:
Pa kaj si bojo za uničevanje še izmislili politiki. Doslej so
uničevali samo z vojsko, sedaj so se domislili, kako uničevati z
skokovitim zmanšanjem in povečanjem obremenitve v petih
minutah.Največ škode na zemlji so povzročali in povzročajo
politiki, v katere so vgrajene samo mantre, kako pognati eno
skupino ljudi proti drugi, sedaj pa so ugotovili, da se da
uničevati tudi z simultanim vklaplanjem in izklaplanjem električne
energije. Kdo jih je tega naučil, ker oni so specializirani na
uničevanje z vojsko in bedarijami.
author: anon-110520

ctx: Na prvi februarski dan pet minut počitka za Zemljo
